pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduction to ProgramaDeReservas - a classroom reservation management system with JWT authentication, explaining its purpose, main features, and high-level architecture

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: High-level system architecture overview - layered design, component relationships, and key design patterns

pages.title: Layered Architecture
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of the presentation (controllers), service, repository, and entity layers and their responsibilities

pages.title: Domain Model
pages.purpose: Entity relationships and the star schema with Reserva at the center, cascade behaviors, and foreign key constraints

pages.title: Technology Stack
pages.purpose: Spring Boot 3.5.6, Java 24, MySQL, JWT libraries, Lombok, MapStruct, and other dependencies

pages.title: Core Domain Entities
pages.purpose: Overview of the four main JPA entities (Reserva, Aula, Horario, Usuario) and their relationships

pages.title: Reserva Entity
pages.purpose: The central reservation entity - fields, relationships, validation constraints, and lazy loading configuration

pages.title: Aula Entity
pages.purpose: Classroom entity with capacity, computer availability, and one-to-many relationship with reservations

pages.title: Horario Entity
pages.purpose: Time slot entity with day of week enum, start/end times, and cascade delete configuration

pages.title: Usuario Entity
pages.purpose: User entity that implements Spring Security's UserDetails interface for JWT authentication

pages.title: Business Logic Layer
pages.purpose: Service classes that implement core business rules, validation, and orchestrate operations

pages.title: ServiceReserva
pages.purpose: Most critical service - reservation creation with date validation, capacity checks, and temporal overlap detection

pages.title: ServiceAula
pages.purpose: Classroom management service with filtering by capacity threshold and computer availability

pages.title: ServiceHorario
pages.purpose: Schedule management service for CRUD operations on time slots

pages.title: ServiceUsuario
pages.purpose: User management service for registration, profile updates, and user queries

pages.title: REST API
pages.purpose: RESTful controllers exposing HTTP endpoints for all resources with @CrossOrigin enabled

pages.title: Reservation API
pages.purpose: CRUD endpoints for reservations with @Valid validation and ReservaRequestDTO/ReservaResponseDTO

pages.title: Classroom API
pages.purpose: Classroom endpoints with optional filtering by capacity and ordenadores parameters

pages.title: Schedule API
pages.purpose: Time slot management endpoints with HorarioDTO for requests and responses

pages.title: User API
pages.purpose: User management endpoints for administrators with UsuarioDTO responses

pages.title: Data Access Layer
pages.purpose: Spring Data JPA repositories with standard CRUD operations and custom query methods

pages.title: Repository Overview
pages.purpose: Explanation of Spring Data JPA repository pattern and automatic implementation generation

pages.title: Custom Query Methods
pages.purpose: Focus on RepositoryReserva's existsSolapamiento overlap detection query and derived query methods

pages.title: Security and Authentication
pages.purpose: JWT-based stateless authentication with OAuth2 Resource Server and role-based authorization

pages.title: Security Configuration
pages.purpose: SecurityConfig with JWT decoder, authentication converter, password encoder, and filter chain

pages.title: Authentication Flow
pages.purpose: Login, registration, profile retrieval, and password change endpoints with LoginRequest/RegisterRequest DTOs

pages.title: User Roles and Authorization
pages.purpose: ROLE_ADMIN and ROLE_PROFESOR roles extracted from JWT claims without prefix

pages.title: Data Transfer and Validation
pages.purpose: DTOs for API contracts, MapStruct mappers for transformations, and Jakarta Bean Validation

pages.title: Data Transfer Objects
pages.purpose: Request/Response DTOs for reservations, classrooms, schedules, users, and authentication

pages.title: MapStruct Mappers
pages.purpose: Entity-DTO bidirectional conversion using MapStruct with custom mappings and null handling strategies
